name: places/ChIJ31-DeYJZwokRCVLQaIjUxhU
formattedAddress: 30 Avenue B, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Avenue B, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text:
Stacy and her team did a beautiful job with my hair. I have curly, sometimes unruly hair so I knew I needed to be strategic with who I hired and the style I went with to ensure my hair stayed the entire wedding day (especially in August!). Stacy did an amazing job giving me the look I wanted, and it was beautiful all night (as good as my hair can possibly stay).

I had a bridal party of 10 and everyone was happy with how their hair turned out! Stacy & Alyssa were on time, professional and fun to be around on wedding day. Aubrey was a pleasure to work with behind the scenes, she was helpful and communicative throughout the entire process. I would highly recommend working with Styles on B!

originalText.text:
I've been to, and had many bridesmaids that were bridesmaids in other weddings and I wanted to make sure I could leave a review for Style on B, as there are a LOT of wedding hairstylists in the greater NYC area and any bride looking into Style on B, please lock them down!!

To begin, my #1 goal was to work with a hairstylist that all of my bridesmaids loved. NONE of them had to fix their hair the day of the wedding which is a testament to how incredible Alyssa is, one of their bridal stylists. If you can have her do your wedding hair, PLEASE do!

Next, Aubrey, their admin was so on top of things, and made the process of working with them such a breeze (which I wish we could say about other wedding vendors).

Thank you Alyssa, we are so grateful!

originalText.text: Laureen is amazing! She did all of our hair (me, my 5 bridesmaids, my mom, and the groom's mom) for my wedding day. Everyone looked gorgeous, yet still looked like themselves. The hair styles looked sophisticated and not over the top. Laureen totally took into account styles that people wanted to try and gave great feedback on what might work best. 10/10 would recommend!

text.text: Laureen is amazing! She did all of our hair (me, my 5 bridesmaids, my mom, and the groom's mom) for my wedding day. Everyone looked gorgeous, yet still looked like themselves. The hair styles looked sophisticated and not over the top. Laureen totally took into account styles that people wanted to try and gave great feedback on what might work best. 10/10 would recommend!

originalText.text: I have been a client of Stacy Pitt's for nine years and have watched her grow Styles on B into an incredible studio! The entire team is highly gifted and absolutely lovely. Unlike other NYC salons, which tend to be overpriced and stuffy, Styles on B has a warm vibe and the team functions like a family, who gladly welcomes clients into its laid-back, friendly atmosphere. Stacy is a true artist and can see what styles/color work best for you. I actually let her work her magic without any expectation and my hair always comes out looking better than what I could have imagined for myself. I have very fine hair, which some stylists simply do not have the ability to handle, and she highlights/dry cuts it to perfection. The assistant stylist, Alyssa, blow dries and styles with a deft hand and I walk out of each appointment looking/feeling like my best self. Aubrey and Katie, who assist with scheduling/logistics, answer emails quickly and are some of the loveliest people you will ever meet. I am so lucky to have stumbled upon Stacy's studio all of those years ago. Thanks, Styles on B, for sharing your professionalism, creative skill, great energy, and kindness with each person who walks through your doors! P.S. the salon is dog friendly, so check with them to see if you can bring your fur baby along for your appointment. Also, you have to walk up one flight of stairs to the second floor, so if you have mobility concerns, this is a factor to consider. They accept cash/check—no credit cards.

originalText.text: Could not have asked for a better experience than working with StylesOnB for my wedding. Aubrey set me up from the inquiry onward and was extremely responsive, helpful and so nice. Laureen was our stylist both for trial and day of, and had a mix of older and younger hair styles (and hair types!) to contend with. Not only did she do a FANTASTIC job, she is also a joy to talk to and a wonderful human being in general. The StylesOnB team was incredibly flexible and understanding given our multiple COVID reschedules and I cannot thank them enough for their patience and customer service from beginning to end. A wonderful team and a BEAUTIFUL job. Thank you and thankful to have the team as part of my wedding!
